text:
Simple Yet Delicious – A Must-Visit!

I had the pleasure of visiting Toast Box, and it truly exceeded my expectations. The food is simple, yet incredibly delicious. I had the signature toast and soft-boiled eggs, which were absolutely perfect—crispy toast with just the right amount of butter and the eggs cooked to perfection. The coffee was equally impressive, rich and smooth, a great complement to the meal.

The atmosphere is casual and cozy, making it a perfect spot for a quick, satisfying meal. If you're looking for something uncomplicated but tasty, Toast Box is the place to go. Highly recommend!
Delicious chicken curry rice. Fast and friendly service. But they really need to remove some seats or readjust the tables and seats. A normal sized human cannot sit properly.
Pleasant breakfast experience and i can sense that the ladies here are really enjoying what they do, greeting us, cleaning the necessary when no customers and engaging well with the customers
Clean nice and orderly place. Food and drinks is reasonably priced. No wofi and power point and hence not for extended stay especially during busy hours.
